text.name: sys_description
text.text: Released in 1994, the PC-FX which succeeds the SuperGrafX is the 32-bit console from NEC and was only sold in Japan. Its games are in CD-ROM format and the controller is very similar to the 6-button controller of the Megadrive. It has a 21 MHz processor, 2 MB of RAM, a display of 256x240 to 341x240 pixels in 16 million colors and 8 channels for sound. Unlike other consoles of her generation, she didn't have a 3D system and relied on Full Motion Video and 2D gaming capabilities. There were 62 games released on the machine, many of which are Hentai.
